form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: CERTIFICATE OF MARRIAGE CELEBRATED IN OTHER FORMS, 23/77

full_text: Screened by NARA 8/18/2023 23/77 CERTIFICATE OF MARRIAGE CELEBRATED IN OTHER FORMS ( See Section 16) oflon 31312 4113 If ) 1. RN Nanch Marking officer Baroda Disisia hereby certify that Shri Harithan Dahya than Desai and 5mt Shantaben Hari than Desai *appeard before me this 11th day of April 1977 and that each of them, in my presence and in the presence of three witnesses who have signed hereunder, have declared that a ceremony of marriage has been performed between them and that they have been living together as husband and wife since the time of their marriage, and that in accordance with their desire to have their marriage registered under this Act, the said marriage has, this 411th day of April 1977 been registered under this Act having effect as from 21.5.38 The marriage is registered in my office They have children as under V Sumitra st Harither 18-12-39 Age 38 daughter lsd) RN Nandi < Jayantilal Haribhan 35 san Marriage Officer for 87. 5.1942 40%-11 3 4 FOIA Bhupa (b)(6) rai Hari Ghen 32 son (sd) Halibhan 2 RRIS 51221mL R22 Husband I minor. mid.
